name: Axis (itch) (Clueless Developer)
description:
Axis

Is an endless game with a simple goal, stay alive as much as possible

Modes

- Classic (hp limit of 10)

- Endless (No HP cap)

- Hardcore (1 HP and hard difficulty)

Difficulty 

The enemy speed is dependent on what difficulty you choose, for touchscreen users, easy mode is recommended. There are 3 difficultly options:

- Easy (Recommended for touchscreen users)

- Normal (Recommended for keyboard users)

- Hard

Controls

There are 2 control schemes; Keyboard and touchscreen. For the keyboard scheme, you move by pressing WASD and attack with C or by clicking the mouse. For the touchscreen control scheme, each button has an input that the player will respond to.

Gameplay

The player starts with 10 HP, to gain HP, you need to capture health drops by attacking it. An enemy with 10 HP will be following you at all times. Another enemy will be following the health drop, so be careful
